00092     IRational*
00093     IRational :: make(IRational *aSrc)
00094     {
00095       Global::init();
00096       Rational* src = dynamic_cast<Rational*>(aSrc);
00097       IRational* retval = 0;
00098       if (src)
00099       {
00100         retval = Rational::make(src);
00101       }
00102       return retval;
00103     }
00104

00107     {
00108       Global::init();
00109       return Rational::make(num, den);
00110     }
00111     
00112     int64_t
00113     IRational :: sRescale(int64_t origValue,
00114         IRational* origBase, IRational* newBase,
00115         Rounding rounding)
00116     {
00117       if (!origBase || !newBase)
00118         return origValue;
00119       return newBase->rescale(origValue, origBase, rounding);
00120     }
00121 
00122     int64_t
00123     IRational :: rescale(int64_t srcValue,
00124         int32_t dstNumerator,
00125         int32_t dstDenominator,
00126         int32_t srcNumerator,
00127         int32_t srcDenominator,
00128         Rounding rounding)
00129     {
00130       return Rational::rescale(srcValue,
00131           dstNumerator, dstDenominator,
00132           srcNumerator, srcDenominator,
00133           rounding);
